website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy, surprisingly bright, and overall comfortable headlamp.
pros: Up to 40 hours of light per charge
Flood, spot, and red light settings
cons: Only 3.5 hours of light with the brightest setting

website_summaries.verdict: BioLite’s headlamps are sturdy, surprisingly bright, and so perfectly designed for maximum comfort, you may forget that it is sitting on your head.
pros: Up to 40 hours of light per charge
Flood, spot, and red light settings
cons: Only 3.5 hours of light with the brightest setting

customer_reviews.title: Regretting this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance taking this on a three and a half week backcountry camping trip and sorely regretted it. First of all the battery life is awful. If I hadn’t brought a solar power bank I would have been screwed. I was often left literally in the dark after only an hour or so on the lowest setting. Also even in the lowest setting this thing is unbearably bright, which is really annoying when you are in a camp with a lot of other people, it is blindingly bright. Wish I had just brought my tried and true regular headlamp which has the right amount of brightness and lasts weeks and weeks with a single battery.
customer_reviews.author: IR

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through tons of headlamps over the past 3 decades and this is by far the most comfortable one I've ever worn. It stays put too. No bouncing around when your running etc... It's also very bright when needed and it has a nice floodlight too. Generally, I'm not a fan of the battery pack being on the back or rechargeables but, this one is small and not an issue. I'll update this review after using it for a few months on its durability and run times.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Lowry

customer_reviews.title: Great ergonomics, not the best controls
customer_reviews.text: Combining the button with the tilt function leads to potential accidental button-pressing (at least while getting used to this head lamp). Also, the on/off function would be great to have on a separate button from the mode selector (which requires quick presses to toggle modes). Otherwise, the light is fantastic and lasts me almost all day at the shop (which feels like more than the advertised 4 hours on high).
customer_reviews.author: Wil Thieme

customer_reviews.title: Don’t trust on long hikes
customer_reviews.text: These are great for a night run in your local trail but don’t trust them on long distance treks because the battery life isn’t good. Failed me after two hours in the bottom of the Grand Canyon. Never again will I trust a rechargeable headlamp in long treks. Oh, it was fully charged but died two hours later.
customer_reviews.author: William Dudas

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly lightweight
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable that you can almost forget you're wearing it - except for the super bright light. Easy to charge from a USB port (cable included) although you'll need an adaptor (not included) to plug the cable into the wall. I bought mine for camping and a trail race. Haven't tried it for either of those yet but it's great for reading in bed.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Penguin

customer_reviews.title: Good but not for long
customer_reviews.text: Used it during a 35k night run. First 30 mins i didn’t have it on then had it on second to highest setting for about a hour. Then the highest setting for about another hour before it died. It was completely charged before the race. I’m glad I brought a back up. I do like the balance and the brightness. I will use it for short runs.
customer_reviews.author: adam s helmig

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it's rechargeable. The lighting options are good. It's plenty bright. It charges pretty quickly. The strap fits well and it doesn't bounce around like others. On the bad side it's difficult to operate due to a very small button and nothing to grasp to flip it forward. It's hard enough with bare hands that I'm sure it's very annoying when wearing gloves. I feel like the company should improve this and give a steep discount for people who have already bought this model to upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Best headlight out there!
customer_reviews.text: This has got to be the best headlight on the market. First of all, its lightweight and doesn't leave the indentations on your forehead that the other headlamps do as the weight/battery sits on the back of your head. The light is extremely bright so be careful and not let anyone look at you while it is on. I am able to see across about 5 of my acres to the barn with this on--No problem! I would highly recommend these headlamps. Though they are a little more expensive than others, it's definitely worth the extra $$
customer_reviews.author: Diana F

customer_reviews.title: Why does it auto dim.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good headlamp I forget I'm wearing it sometimes it's so comfortable. Battery life is acceptable for a headlamp. What I cant forgive them for is that this headlamp will auto dim slowly over the course of 15min to half brightness and you have to manually turn it back up to full brightness. It dims so slowly it's almost imperceptible until find yourself needing more light. What is the point of advertising 330 lumin if you keep dimming it down.
customer_reviews.author: M.C.

customer_reviews.title: 110% Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this headlamp! I have 3 of them. They’re light weight, battery life is long enough for my needs, love the different settings. Have used for multiple settings- walking the dogs, setting up ceiling lights, installing cameras, at night while camping, etc. The head lamp has never died out on me I try to be diligent with the battery. Charged fully prior to camping, used for each night about 2 hours each for 3 nights and still had battery when I returned home. Love how you can adjust the light beam to different angles, How it doesn’t get too hot on your head, and it’s light. Biolite also is a great company with great support.
customer_reviews.author: Makayla Hugo

customer_reviews.title: reliable
customer_reviews.text: I use this for pre-sunrise runs. The light is bright enough for running on the street and sidewalks, or walking on trails. The battery pack slides down if I try and wear my hair in a ponytail so I've had to switch to wearing a braid. Not a big deal, but something to think about for those of us with long hair. Overall more comfortable than other headlamps I've used.
customer_reviews.author: HAE

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable headlamp
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the most comfortable headlamp, super bright , my only little complaint compared to my black diamond headlamp , the spot light on the bio lite sill a little more spread wide then spit , I have to take care of and infant at night and I need my head lamp to just shine on one specific thing , not light the whole area , the black diamond this , but it killed my head, in conclusion I wish it had a better spot lite on the bio lite, this head lamp was worth every penny, supper great headlamp
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The dimming works great. This pumps out a ton of light when you have it at max. Red, spot, flood, spot and flood, and blinking white light features. I head banged with it and jogged with it and it stays very secure without feeling like it's cutting off circulation. Bring a battery pack with you camping and you could recharge in the wilderness. Would be a great option for running for visibility and safety.
customer_reviews.author: Holden Andrew Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: No serial number, no warranty.
customer_reviews.text: This review is written on day one. Out of the box I found the light very comfortable and easy to adjust. I wore it while walking my dog and it seems to be very bright; I think it’s going to work out great. My first frustration though is it did not come with a serial number so I cannot register it for warranty. I will update my review after a few runs.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Different feeling kinda light
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was defective after I initially charged it....but it wasn’t. It felt a little funny wearing it for the first time.....It feels great, like it’s almost not there. Worn on the red loop, 6.9ish miles, Kentuckiana Ragnar. The trail was very dark and the light performed perfectly for an after midnight trail run. I’d use it for work but I don’t want it to get that dirty yucky gross cobwebs dust grim who knows what else would get smeared on it.....I’m a plumber It’s a very good light! I’m happy I own one. It definitely will be used later this training year and next during those late night runs when the sun isn’t out so long.
customer_reviews.author: Michael John Murphy

customer_reviews.title: excellent little headlamp
customer_reviews.text: I use this for night trail runs/races. The longest I've used it was probably for 4 hours (maybe 1 hour in the morning at the start of a race and then 3 or so hours at the end of the race). Worked well, stayed fairly bright. I would imagine that if I was running 100 miles and had to run through the night that I would have to charge it, but not a big deal. It is VERY comfortable. No bouncing around like many other headlamps. And no batteries!
customer_reviews.author: megan parke

customer_reviews.title: Works great for running!
customer_reviews.text: I use this light for trail running and have found it bright, lightweight, stays in place and comfortable to use. Adjustable LED’s provide a wide range of brightness for any needs and beam can be adjusted up or down to put the light were you want it. Definitely can recommend this light for runners looking for a bright and lightweight lamp.
customer_reviews.author: ME Skier

customer_reviews.title: Functions well but not in cold weather
customer_reviews.text: Functions well. Took it out this weekend for the first winter trip. After 3hrs the biolite failed on me. It turned off. Lucky I had spare my trusted black diamond spot. I want to love this biolite so need to try a few more times but for winter weather doesn’t last.
customer_reviews.author: Boricua_Soy

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the beat headlamps I have owned. The battery life is pretty decent though on high power it won't last too many hours. The functions fit my needs and it's nice to be able to dim it down when I don't need super bright light. I also enjoy being able to charge via USB.
customer_reviews.author: Dave M

customer_reviews.title: Lights up well
customer_reviews.text: Excellent light for running. Brightness is more than adequate. It does not bounce when running. Button to change mode is a bit clunky but I do not adjust the mode while running so no big deal for me. It also quite light and well distributed in weight as battery pack in the back.
customer_reviews.author: Saleem Ali

customer_reviews.title: Super powerful in a light, rechargeable package.
customer_reviews.text: Love this new headlamp. Very powerful and comfortable. The adjustable lamp angle a great feature, as well as the red light setting for ‘stealth’ mode and following trail. However, since batteries are rechargeable I’d suggest carrying a battery pack or solar charger to ensure a charging source when in the field.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great light intensity and light options
customer_reviews.text: I really like the different light modes (narrow, wide) and ability to adjust the intensity. No problem staying on when I work on cars, cut wood at night, etc. The battery life is good ... about 4 hours; and it’s easy to charge with the supplied USB cable. The band fits comfortably on my head. The switch does take getting used to, particularly if you’re wearing gloves.
customer_reviews.author: sadswimmer

customer_reviews.title: It lights up my area of focus quite nicely!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this in my house three days and they want a review already! Really?... It is, as a video says, a bit tricky to get the hang of the lights.... all of them to light separately. As for the two white lights together.. dimmed... it gave me quite a nice view range of the garden area I want to work on in the night when the hot sun is gone down! This is the main reason I picked one.
customer_reviews.author: De Etta

customer_reviews.title: Dare I say... The perfect headlamp?
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Weight distribution is perfect even with the battery pack in the back. I don’t even notice it. The battery life is great. I like the light settings too. The spot and flood are just right. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Dennis C.

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good.
customer_reviews.text: I've had the chance to use my Bio Lite a few times over the three weeks I have had it. Good bright light, doesn't keep charge as well as I thought it would. In my estimation it's a bit overpriced. But I do like it.
customer_reviews.author: Real customer

customer_reviews.title: Small and mighty!
customer_reviews.text: I've owned several different headlamps over the years (including other claimed "lightweight" models) and this is by far the slimmest and least intrusive. Haven't used it much, but I look forward to better comfort and visibility during night runs. Better range of features/lighting options than my similarly-sized Black Diamond model.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally a quality headlamp without the awkward bulk
customer_reviews.text: A quality headlamp with a very bright light to walk my dogs in the winter darkness. I generally just use the bright white light for high viability, and I fully appreciate how well I can see and be seen. Also, the rechargeable battery is great; long life and the dot lights let you know when it needs to be recharged.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy M.

customer_reviews.title: Great headlamp!
customer_reviews.text: I love it so much I bought a second one. The battery lasts about 5 hours (less if on full 330 lumens) but it only takes about 2 hrs to fully charge.
customer_reviews.author: A. Blake

customer_reviews.title: Beat headlamp ever!
customer_reviews.text: Usually headlamps irritate after a few hours and the headband is uncomfortable. This lamp you can wear for hours and not know it’s there. Moving the battery to the rear makes it very balanced, easy to trail run in. My only issue is the button is very small, difficult while wearing gloves and I wish You could swap the battery pack instead of having to recharge.
customer_reviews.author: Mattedhairs

customer_reviews.title: Best head light
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I love by a light products they keep getting better and better! I have a mini headlights that I’ve tried over the years this one tops them all.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest

customer_reviews.title: Best headlamp around
customer_reviews.text: This is the best headlamp I have ever used. It's comfortable on the head and so bright. I love the recharge versus using batteries. The charge is long lasting and I have used it skinning up mountains and skiing down with amazing visibility at night. Camping and going on night hikes, and reading at night while camping...
customer_reviews.author: jenell hilderbrand

customer_reviews.title: nice bright light
customer_reviews.text: I love this lghtwiehgt little light. It is very bright. my only compplaint is that the battery life is not consistent following a charge.
customer_reviews.author: kristine

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: This headlamp is working great so far - very bright and very light on the forehead. Haven't used it enough to test battery life though. Make sure to read the instructions about initial use - it tends to go into a default mode that is likely not want you want. Need to hold the button long enough to get into actual use mode.
customer_reviews.author: JimBobRob

customer_reviews.title: Best headlamp for active living
customer_reviews.text: My husband has this and I loved it so much that he got me one! We are farmers and this is so comfortable to wear for doing all kinds of work on fencing and with animals... sweating, it’s amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Homeschool mom

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but limited charge.
customer_reviews.text: Great brightness and the balance is excellent on your head! The battery life is limited. You'll need to ensure it's charged fully before your next 20miler. Thankfully it's got a usb charger and spins up pretty fast.
customer_reviews.author: PiercingArrowz

customer_reviews.title: Great, but carry a battery pack.
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite headlamp for dark early morning runs. However I do a lot of hiking overnight for mountain sunrises. My only qualm is it's battery life. At full blast I only get 3.5 hours and have to recharge it with my portable battery pack while wearing it. Still worth it in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: PJ Regan

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable headlamp
customer_reviews.text: By far the most comfortable headlamp I have ever owned. I bought my first one on the initial Kickstarter campaign. Bought this second one due to the battery life. Since the battery cannot be switch out, I needed another headlamp for running all the way through the night. I could have just dimmed it down to make it last, but running on technical trails I wanted a brighter light. Easy to use and switch between different modes.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan80

customer_reviews.title: Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Defective doesn’t work at all. Item arrived late then I missed the return window due to being in a car accident. $50 down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Professor Valorie D. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Happy so far!!
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t gotten to use the light yet. I will say it’s very bright, and I’m sure it will get the job done. It is very little weight, and stays in place. It is a little tricky getting through the different setting, I’m sure I will figure out, but that is the only negative I’ve found.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta A. Quinones

customer_reviews.title: Great product, brightness is a 10!
customer_reviews.text: Biolight headlamp is amazing! I charged it once and didn’t use for 2 months, then I went for a run and it still had battery. It turned on right away and it lasted for the entire run!! It is light, very bright and it works wonderfully!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gear Geek Recommended
customer_reviews.text: When I was in the market for a new headlamp, I contacted one of my favorite gear geeks. She was so excited to tell me about this headlamp and I immediately placed an order. I have not been disappointed. The design (with a rechargeable battery in back) is remarkably comfortable. The brightness and light options are fantastic. And the customer service with BioLite is extraordinary. (I contacted them about an issue and not only had a response but I had a resolution within hours!)
customer_reviews.author: DREA

customer_reviews.title: Nice bright light that doesn't break the budget
customer_reviews.text: Really nice light. Plenty bright enough for night runs. Like that it's USB rechargeable so I don't have to change batteries all the time. The battery case is in the back, which makes the front nice and lightweight, but the battery case itself is a little heavy and can bounce around a bit unless you have it pretty tight around your head. A third strap to go over the top of your head would maybe be nice too. All around good product though.
customer_reviews.author: t

customer_reviews.title: Sleek design and comfortable fit, not bright enough for trail running
customer_reviews.text: I really like how the brow band sits on the forehead comfortably. I like the design. The first week that I used this light I went trail running in the early morning and tripped and fell. In my opinion, this light isn’t bright enough for running on trails in the dark, but it’s fine for smoother surfaces. I charge the battery at least every other workout, because it does on me after going for a couple runs once.
customer_reviews.author: Lara Black

customer_reviews.title: Best headlamp I’ve owned
customer_reviews.text: Best head lamp I’ve had. Rally like the low profile on the front, and it’s really comfortable. Also like the no batteries to replace. Great for hunting with the red light, that saves your night vision.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: slim and low profile
customer_reviews.text: The head lamp is slim and low profiled does feel like u have it on the only down side it the battery life doesnt last very long
customer_reviews.author: Jason young

customer_reviews.title: Great light.
customer_reviews.text: Super light and won't bounce when you run or go night-pogo-sticking. Switch locks when put away so it won't turn on in your pack and leave you with an ugly surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Sonntag

customer_reviews.title: Good deal!!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used but a few hours. Seems like a quality headlamp. I like that it has an indicator to show the battery level. Only complaint I have is I have a big head and the band fits nicely with no beanie on but it would be pretty tight with a beanie on with the biggest setting on the headband.
customer_reviews.author: Ty Hayman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and comfortable, love the products from Biolite. Have several!
customer_reviews.author: Me2

customer_reviews.title: Light Weight
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a trip to Sweden but there wasn't any night. So Ill have to review it with the trips here in Iowaq where it does get dark. Works very well to the point where I foeget it is on my head.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Heath

customer_reviews.title: Stays put
customer_reviews.text: It really does not bounce! I haven't tried it yet with a hat, but sitting on my forehead it stays put. The strap does fall down if I don't have it tight enough, but the forehead piece with the lamp stays right where it needs to be.
customer_reviews.author: ouesi

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable for me I don’t like things like this on my head
customer_reviews.text: This probably works just fine it could be excellent I don’t know I could not stand the way it felt on my head. So I didn’t really test it out. If you think you can handle a headband with a little bit of weight to it go for it
customer_reviews.author: Mary Mary Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: This is the best and brightest light I have ever used. The battery life is great and this light gives me my hands back. All the settings work as stated. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Grover Wrenn

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable to wear in rain and snow.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. This is a fabulous piece of gear. USB charging along with comfort. It is a little pricey but it is made by a company that works to create products that work well and help sustain the environment.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Got this because the days got shorter and if I wanted to run, it would need to be in the dark. Also had a race where the first 1.5mi were in an unlit tunnel. This headlamp is perfect. My old one bounced a little too much for my tastes and I love that it’s rechargeable.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Great headlamp for running
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and lightweight, and does not bounce while running. Band is easy to adjust on the move as well without taking it off. Brightness and range as advertised, has been perfect for running on dark streets. I haven’t used it for trail running yet. Battery life is acceptable, I typically get about three to four hours of use before it needs to be charged. The battery indicator is a nice feature. It’s helpful to have an idea of how much is left before I start.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Dawes

customer_reviews.title: Great headlamp has to be one of the lightest out there.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know what to expect with this headlamp but when I got it, the sleek next to skin design, the brightness of the light and the recharge ability make it a great option.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Best headlamp out there
customer_reviews.text: Really nice YES IT IS POWERFUL love the feel and easy to adjust Easy to flip down without turning it off Recharge is fast
customer_reviews.author: Dr. K. Mckae

customer_reviews.title: Balanced and light weight
customer_reviews.text: My wife was unable to wear lights with the battery and the light in the front while she runs in the dark. This light FINALLY made her happy!
customer_reviews.author: Rickstwowheels

customer_reviews.title: Small and bright
customer_reviews.text: I keep this in my luggage - I travel for work and run in unfamiliar locations all the time. This light is so bright but also small and lightweight. It’s exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Saeger

customer_reviews.title: Stays in place!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! Stays in place for street and trail running, even in the rain and even when I get really sweaty. The battery pack in the back may feel weighty for some, but that's the trade off for the good battery life.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Get one! You will love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this light! I purchased it for backpacking. Haven’t used it on the trail as yet, but I use it around the house and out walking almost daily. Get one! You will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas H. Bludworth

customer_reviews.title: very solid headlamp
customer_reviews.text: I am using the lamp now for several months and its one of the best I ever owned. The small footprint and low weight makes it very handy and comfortable to use. Brightness is more than enough for me and battery life very solid. I am using it every other day to stuff in my garden and around the house after dark.
customer_reviews.author: christoph dressel

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great light. Light weiht and we'll balanced. Very comfortable and works great for active use.
customer_reviews.author: Shanae

customer_reviews.title: Battery pack in
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Excellent idea to have USP in the back and NOT on my forehead.
customer_reviews.author: GabyM

customer_reviews.title: This headlamp rules
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically for a Ragnar 200mi relay race. Worked great in the dark, cold country roads of New England. One charge carried me through 17 overnight miles with plenty of battery left. No slipping or bouncing. Light, bright and super low profile. Fits well over a hat, too. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: PM

customer_reviews.title: Great running headlamp!
customer_reviews.text: Love this headlamp! Worth the $50. I have used it 3-4 mornings a week for about 6 months and still love it. I run 30-60 miles a week and do a lot of trail running if that helps.
customer_reviews.author: HB

customer_reviews.title: Vwey Bright
customer_reviews.text: This thing is bright. I looked at the light by mistake and was seeing dots.
customer_reviews.author: BBQisgreat

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son-in-law to use while walking the dog and they used it for a camping trip and it was just the best!!
customer_reviews.author: Kellyn w

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and powerful.
customer_reviews.text: This without a doubt the best headlamp I've ever purchased. Button to switch modes is a little small , but with practice should be no problem. Excellent multi functions. Plan to have this readily available in vehicle, and take with backpack when I use it. It's worth the money, rather pricey.
customer_reviews.author: robert margeson

customer_reviews.title: Best running lite
customer_reviews.text: Great lite, surprisingly comfortable to run with it. almost forget its there.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable bright and stable
customer_reviews.text: Love running at night with this headlamp. It is bright and you can adjust the angle to light up the road ahead of you during a run. It is light enough and has a narrow profile and with the battery portion situated in the rear it is quite stable and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: keith pilkey

customer_reviews.title: No bounce when I used for my 70K Trail Running
customer_reviews.text: I love the ease of use. The lightness and the material. In the trail running that I participate the track is mix of sand, gravel and majority pass coffee plantation. The terrain mix create a lot of dust and the sweat makes it worst. With BioLite the material in the band did not make you itchy or uncomfortable. You can keep running without worry.
customer_reviews.author: Yosafat

customer_reviews.title: Great for running
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Run with it during my early morning or late runs. Really illuminated well, doesn't shake, light weight, a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Phil M

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Amazing headlamp. Great construction of the product. Super bright and lightweight. A little on the high side for price but its worth it.
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, good light, lasts a longtime
customer_reviews.text: In the dark northwest, you really need a good headlamp for evening dog walks. Love these.
customer_reviews.author: Morty

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Adore this headlamp. Not clunky or bulky, looks almost like a headband! Bright, long life (never died on a 2 night trip) and not needing to pack batteries makes it perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Christin Basham

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and bright
customer_reviews.text: This headband is comfortable and bright. The variety of settings can help you conserve battery. I never had an issue seeing terrain even running on single track trails with roots.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great light!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I like the headlamp. The controls are intuitive and work fine even with gloves on. I don’t know why everyone seems to have that issue... the only complaint I would have is that the battery life isn’t anywhere close to what I expected. Would be awesome to have a version that had a replaceable battery in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Excellent light for dark morning runs!
customer_reviews.text: The brightness on this blows away the typically headlamp! The rechargeable battery on the back is very light, and does not bounce around. Absolutely excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Richards

customer_reviews.title: Great headlamp!

product_meta.title: BioLite HeadLamp 330 Lumen No-Bounce Rechargeable Head Light
feature_bullets: The ultrathin 3D molded housing sits flat on your forehead. That means no bounce, no slip. By integrating our electronics into the fabric, we pack all your lighting into an ultra-thin facing that is designed to fit as seamlessly as a contact lens.
Moisture-wicking fabric keeps you cool and dry for any activity and the rechargeable battery means you can leave the alkalines behind.
Max Output 330 Lumens, Adjustable Front Panel, Red Night Vision Included
40 hours of battery on LO, 3.5 Hours on HIGH, Recharge Via Micro USB.

HeadLamp 330 is made from high-quality moisture-wicking band that keeps your forehead comfortable and dry during activity. Best of all - no abrasion points. The easy-adjust clips also take the guess work out of right-sizing your band.
